title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Typophile Welcomes Ngoc Ngo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50334 "Typophile Welcomes Ngoc Ngo")

We’re pleased to announce Typophile’s first dedicated employee. [Ngoc Ngo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203256/http:/typophile.com/user/33598/track) is a seasoned consultant and an MFA candidate focused on graphic design at [Academy of Art University](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203256/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Academy%252Bof%252BArt%252BUniversity). He has joined [Punchcut](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203256/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Punchcut) at our San Francisco office and will be engaged on a number of initiatives for this site and for the Typophile community.

We’re looking forward to the traction that he’ll bring to our modest world domination plans. Please say hello!
author: Joe Pemberton
